title: Roger Goodell defends Rooney Rule, despite recent hiring trends

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Roger Goodell defends Rooney Rule, despite recent hiring trends
sources.description: As expected, Monday's Super Bowl press conference from Commissioner Roger Goodell included multiple questions about the effectiveness of the league's diversity policies, given a hiring cycle that resulted in 10 head-coaching vacancies filled by one minority candidate (Robert Saleh) and no Black candidates.
